Document.name: Modify
Document.summary: Modify some text lines by replacing characters.
Document.param: The start position of the range of characters to be replaced.
The end position of the range of characters to be replaced.
The buffer to the string buffers to replace into the text lines.
The numbers of characters for each string buffer.
Document.signature: TextPos Modify( TextPos start, TextPos end, wchar_t const * * inputs, vint * inputCounts, vint rows );
